content.title: International Shipping Update ‚Äì Overcoming Lithium Battery Restrictions
content.creator:
InsGlo Team
February 25, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We have officially begun international shipping! However, we encountered an unexpected challenge‚ÄîUSPS has returned all our shipments due to restrictions on lithium batteries, causing delays and postage losses. We are actively exploring alternative shipping solutions and will make another attempt soon.
Please note that shipping regulations vary by country, and while we are doing our best to resolve these issues, in some strict cases, we may need to issue refunds. Alternatively, if there‚Äôs an opportunity for bulk shipments or distribution partnerships in your region, we‚Äôd love to explore that as a solution.
Thank you for your patience and support as we work through these logistics. We‚Äôll keep you updated!
Best,
The InsGlo Team

content.title: Kickstarter Update: US Orders Fulfilled!
content.creator:
InsGlo Team
February 18, 2025
content.content:
Great news! üéâ We have successfully fulfilled all orders within the US!
For our international backers, you're next! Since customs processes vary by region, we may encounter different obstacles and potential delays. However, our goal is to complete all shipping this week. ü§û Fingers crossed for smooth logistics!
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out here or through our email Hello@Insglonow.com.
Thank you for your patience and support! üíô

content.title: Update on InsGlo Fulfillment ‚Äì Logistics, Customs & Powerstick Replacement
content.creator:
InsGlo Team
February 6, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We have now locked all backer addresses and are actively preparing for fulfillment. But we have encountered new challenges along the way. Recent changes in U.S. tariff policies under the Trump administration have caused turbulence in global logistics, leading to unexpected shipping delays and backlogs. We are working diligently to resolve these issues as quickly as possible.
Additionally, due to the complexity and restrictions around shipping battery related products, we regret to inform you that we are unable to ship the Powerstick as originally planned. To ensure a smoother and faster delivery process, we will be upgrading it with an additional InsGlo device in a different color. This alternative is of significantly higher value and provides you with an extra style option to complement your routine. We appreciate your understanding and hope you enjoy this upgrade.
Please note that customs clearance at different countries may require cooperation from the receiver, and we will reach out with specific instructions if needed.
Thank you for your patience and support. We‚Äôre doing everything we can to get InsGlo to you as soon as possible! Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions.
Best regards,
Joey

comments.text: Thanks so much for the update and, of course, even more appreciation for the upgrade !!! That is very thoughtful of you and it proves to me and your other customers that you truly believe in your products üòä. You rock !!! ( P.S. - Sorry about the unexpected glitches you've experienced in the new mailing-rules process üòü , but you have chosen to overcome these obstacles and be victorious in the end üëç . I definitely respect that attitude !! )

content.title: üéâ Product Shipping Update ‚Äì Action Needed!
content.creator:
InsGlo Team
January 27, 2025
content.content:
Hi everyone,
We‚Äôre thrilled to announce that the InsGlo devices are ready to ship! üöÄ
However, if you haven‚Äôt completed the backer survey yet, please do so as soon as possible. We cannot ship your device until we have your survey response, including your mailing address and preferences.
üì¢ Important Shipping Note:
The Chinese New Year holiday is ongoing until February 4th, during which all logistics and work are paused. Once the holiday concludes, we will begin shipping your orders promptly, most likely starting the week of February 4th.
To avoid delays, please ensure your survey is completed before shipping resumes!
Thank you for your patience and support as we work to deliver InsGlo to you. We can‚Äôt wait for you to experience it!
Warm regards,
The InsGlo Team

content.title: InsGlo is officially funded! Thank you!
content.creator:
InsGlo Team
January 6, 2025
content.content:
InsGlo has reached its funding goal in the last hour! From everyone at InsGlo, thank you so much for the support. You‚Äôve helped us bring this project to life. WE DID IT!!! THANK YOU!!!
Now that things are official, all of you will be able to get involved and help us shape the skincare device in the months to come. We feel so lucky to be developing InsGlo alongside you all. It's been heartwarming to see the community grow. From actively participating in Discord, helping us answer questions in and out of Kickstarter, and providing awesome feedback/suggestions, we're thrilled you'll be joining us on this journey!

What's next?
Our priority remains working on the F1 Alpha that is scheduled to release on 1/20.  Over the next 14 days, Kickstarter will confirm pledges with backers. Later this month, we will post an update about the rewards, mini post-campaign QnA, and share a timeline of the project with you all. 
For those who missed our campaign, we are working on a pre-order store and Amazon links. We will post an update to inform you when ready!
Cheers
Joey

content.title: We‚Äôre Almost There ‚Äì Help Us Cross the Finish Line! üöÄ
content.creator:
InsGlo Team
January 4, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We‚Äôre so close to hitting our funding goal! Thanks to your incredible support, InsGlo has already reached 94% of our target with just 48 hours left. You‚Äôve been an amazing part of this journey, and we couldn‚Äôt have done it without you.
But we‚Äôre not there yet. We need one last push to make InsGlo a reality! Here‚Äôs how you can help:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Share the Campaign: Spread the word with friends, family, or anyone you know who values innovative, effective skincare. Your voice makes a huge difference.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Pledge or Upgrade Your Rewards: If you‚Äôve been eyeing a higher-tier reward or thinking about adding another InsGlo for a loved one, now‚Äôs the perfect time to lock it in.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Tag Us and Share Your Excitement: Post about InsGlo on social media and tag us. Let your network know why you backed us.
Every single backer, share, and pledge gets us closer to bringing InsGlo to life. Let's hit the finish line together and start a new chapter in skincare innovation!
Thank you for being the heart of this project. Together, we‚Äôll make it happen!
With gratitude,
Joey
